description:
These matches burn tenaciously and will relight even after several seconds of complete submersion. A great addition to any emergency kit.

  • Includes 25 matches and 2 extra strikers
  • Easy to light and will relight after being submerged
  • If matches are wet, just wipe dry before lighting (striker needs to be dry to light)
  • Up to 25 second burn time
  • Extended length (10.5cm) prevents burning your fingertips
  • Note: match will not extinguish until chemical has burned out, should be doused in water to completely extinguish
name: UCO Titan Stormproof Matches
